comments.en: 4 cartridges: one each for CMYK. Also 4 replaceable printheads.

For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

CMYK printing, Large format: 13x19inch/A3 paper.

2500Cse model is US retail channel model, 2500Cxi model is US business channel model, 2500C+ includes PCL 5 support.

With HP's "hpijs" this printer can be used as a printer of the old DeskJet 900 series (DeskJet 970C and alike), but the photo mode is not supported.

In the PCL-5c (Color LaserJet) emulation this printer is extremely slow.
